text: The masked mouse-tailed dormouse (Myomimus personatus) is a species of dormouse in the Gliridae family. It is found in Iran and Turkmenistan. == Source == * Tchabovsky, A. 1996. Myomimus personatus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 30 July 2007. Category:Myomimus Category:Mammals of Asia
title: Masked mouse-tailed dormouse
